TopicTitle: Integral Industries - Building Craft of All Shapes and Sizes since 2015

Articles.Content:
Integral Industries

Building Craft of All Shapes and Sizes since 2015

 

Hey guys, whats up, it's MacGamer04 and I'm making craft, because why the heck not! Below are all my crafts that are currently available, divided into sections so that you can easily navigate. Enjoy these craft, and I hope to hear feedback from you below!

 

Vehicle Assembly Building

Griffin 3.1

http://kerbalx.com/MacGamer04/Griffin-31

The Griffin is a rocket that is capable of making a return landing to Kerbin. The Griffin can only be reused when it's trajectory takes it over a landmass, as the fuel required to make a KSC returned is well beyond my abilities as a KSP player. Through testing, the Griffin works best when on a trajectory that is mostly polar, not exactly polar, but within about 10 degrees.

 

Spaceplane Hanger

I-21A

http://kerbalx.com/MacGamer04/Integral-Industries-I-21A

The I-21A is a small business jet, carries one crew and 4 passengers. Through testing, the I-21 has a medium range, and is capable of pulling about 25G before breaking apart. Near-vertical climbs are also possible with this

 

I-9000

http://kerbalx.com/MacGamer04/Integral-Industries-I-9000

The I-9000 is another small business jet, with one crew and 6 passengers. The I-9000 cruises at about 220 m/s and 9000m, and at that speed and altitude, it can make it from the KSC, across the ocean, and land on the next main landmass. However, you better have KAS installed if you want to make the return trip, because it lands with about 10 units of fuel leftover.

 

 

 

Edited January 24, 2016 by MacGamer04
Re-Vamping the OP

Please keep in mind that we've tightened up our rules, since the pretend-companies were causing arguments and other trouble on the forum. It's fine to have a brand name and logo, but no more "hiring" employees or company rivalries.
Thanks for the info @Vanamonde. So can I say that I want people helping me test, but not 'hiring' them?
Folks can help you, but the fiction that they're your employees is the sort of thing that was causing rivalries and whatnot.
